sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout-sider
    :class="['sider', isDesktop() ? null : 'shadow', theme, fixSiderbar ? 'ant-fixed-sidemenu' : null ]"
    width="200px"
    :collapsible="collapsible"
    v-model="collapsed"
    :trigger="null">
    <logo />
    <s-menu
      :collapsed="collapsed"
      :menu="menus"
      :theme="theme"
      @select="onSelect"
      :mode="mode"
      :style="smenuStyle">
    </s-menu>
  </a-layout-sider>

</template>

<script>
  import ALayoutSider from "ant-design-vue/es/layout/Sider"
  import Logo from '../tools/Logo'
  import SMenu from './index'
  import { mixin, mixinDevice } from '@/utils/mixin.js'

  export default {
    name: "SideMenu",
    components: { ALayoutSider, Logo, SMenu },
    mixins: [mixin, mixinDevice],
    props: {
      mode: {
        type: String,
        required: false,
        default: 'inline'
      },
      theme: {
        type: String,
        required: false,
        default: 'dark'
      },
      collapsible: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
      },
      collapsed: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
      },
      menus: {
        type: Array,
        required: true
      }
    },
    computed:{
      smenuStyle() {
        let style = { 'padding': '0' }
        if (this.fixSiderbar) {
          style['height'] = 'calc(100% - 59px)'
          style['overflow'] = 'auto'
          style['overflow-x'] = 'hidden'
        }
        return style
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSelect (obj) {
        this.$emit('menuSelect', obj)
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

  /* update_begin author:sunjianlei date:20190509 for: 修改侧边导航栏滚动条的样式 */
  .sider {
    $scrollBarSize: 10px;

    ul.ant-menu {

      /* 定义滚动条高宽及背景 高宽分别对应横竖滚动条的尺寸*/
      &::-webkit-scrollbar {
        width: $scrollBarSize;
        height: $scrollBarSize;
        background-color: transparent;
        display: none;
      }

      & .-o-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }

      /* 兼容IE */
      -ms-overflow-style: none;
      -ms-scroll-chaining: chained;
      -ms-content-zooming: zoom;
      -ms-scroll-rails: none;
      -ms-content-zoom-limit-min: 100%;
      -ms-content-zoom-limit-max: 500%;
      -ms-scroll-snap-type: proximity;
      -ms-scroll-snap-points-x: snapList(100%, 200%, 300%, 400%, 500%);

      /* 定义滚动条轨道 */
      &::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
        background-color: transparent;
      }

      /* 定义滑块 */
      &::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        border-radius: $scrollBarSize;
        background-color: #eee;
        box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

        &:hover {
          background-color: #dddddd;
        }

        &:active {
          background-color: #bbbbbb;
        }
      }
    }

    /** 暗色系滚动条样式 */
    &.dark ul.ant-menu {
      &::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background-color: #666666;

        &:hover {
          background-color: #808080;
        }

        &:active {
          background-color: #999999;
        }
      }
    }

  }

  /* update_end author:sunjianlei date:20190509 for: 修改侧边导航栏滚动条的样式 */

  .ant-layout-sider{
    background: #08436c;
  }

</style>

<!-- update_begin author:sunjianlei date:20190530 for: 选中首页的时候不显示背景颜色 -->
<style lang="scss">
  .ant-menu.ant-menu-root {
    & > .ant-menu-item:first-child {
      background-color: transparent;
      & > a {
        font-size: 15px;
        & > i {
          font-size: 20px;
          padding-right: 17px;
        }
      }
     & > a:hover {
      }

      &.ant-menu-item-selected {
        background-color: #e6f7ff;
        & > a, & > a:hover {
        }
      }
    }

    & > .ant-menu-item {
      background-color: transparent;
      & > a {
        font-size: 15px;
        & > i {
          font-size: 20px;
          padding-right: 17px;
        }
      }
      & > a:hover {
      }

      &.ant-menu-item-selected {
        background-color: #e6f7ff;
        & > a, & > a:hover {
        }
      }
    }

    & > .ant-menu-submenu {
      background-color: transparent;
      & > div {
        font-size: 15px;
        & i {
          font-size: 20px;
          padding-right: 17px;
        }
      }
      & > div:hover {
      }

      &.ant-menu-item-selected {
        & > div, & > div:hover {
        }
      }

      & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-item {
        background-color: transparent;
        & > a{
          font-size: 15px;
          & > span{
            margin-left:25px;
          }
        }
        & > a:hover {
        }

        &.ant-menu-item-selected {
          background-color: #e6f7ff;
          & > a, & > a:hover {
          }
        }
      }

      & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-submenu {
        background-color: transparent;
        & > div {
          font-size: 15px;
          & span {
            margin-left: 12px;
          }
          & > i {
            padding-right: 17px;
          }
        }
        & > div:hover {
        }

        &.ant-menu-item-selected {
          & > div, & > div:hover {
          }
        }

        & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-item {
          background-color: transparent;
          & > a{
            font-size: 15px;
            & > span{
            }
          }
          & > a:hover {
          }

          &.ant-menu-item-selected {
            background-color: #e6f7ff;
            & > a, & > a:hover {
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark{
      background-color: #08436c !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub{
      background-color: #0a3757 !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu{
      background-color: #0a3757 !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-sub{
      background-color: #062c46 !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark > .ant-menu-item:first-child:hover{
      background-color: #0157a7 !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark > .ant-menu-item:first-child {
      background-color: #08436c !important;
      & > a{
        /*font-size: 15px;*/
        color: #fff !important;
        & > i {
          /*font-size: 20px;*/
          /*padding-right:17px;*/
        }
      }
      & > a:hover {
        /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.65);*/
        color: #022570 !important;
      }

      &.ant-menu-item-selected {
        background-color: #cfecff !important;
        & > a{
          color: #2f54eb !important;
        }
        & > a:hover {
          /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
          color: #022570 !important;
        }
      }
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark > .ant-menu-item:hover{
      background-color: #0157a7 !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark > .ant-menu-item {
      background-color: #08436c !important;
      & > a{
        /*font-size: 15px;*/
        color: #fff !important;
        & > i {
          /*font-size: 20px;*/
          /*padding-right:17px;*/
        }
      }
      & > a:hover {
        /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.65);*/
        color: #022570 !important;
      }

      &.ant-menu-item-selected {
        background-color: #cfecff !important;
        & > a{
          color: #2f54eb !important;
        }
        & > a:hover {
          /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
          color: #022570 !important;
        }
      }
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark > .ant-menu-submenu:hover{
      background-color: #0157a7 !important;
    }

    &.ant-menu-dark > .ant-menu-submenu{
      background-color: #08436c !important;
      & > div{
        /*font-size: 15px;*/
        color: #fff !important;
        & i {
          /*font-size: 20px;*/
          /*padding-right:17px;*/
        }
      }
      & > div:hover {
        /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.65);*/
        color: #022570 !important;
      }

      &.ant-menu-item-selected {
        /*background-color: #cfecff !important;*/
        & > div{
          color: #fff !important;
        }
        & > div:hover {
          /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
          color: #022570 !important;
        }
      }

      & >.ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-item:hover{
        background-color: #0175c6 !important;
      }

      & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-item {
        background-color: #0a3757 !important;
        & > a{
          color: #fff !important;
          & > span{
            /*margin-left:25px;*/
          }
        }
        & > a:hover {
          /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
          color: #022570 !important;
        }

        &.ant-menu-item-selected {
          background-color: #cfecff !important;
          & > a{
            color: #2f54eb !important;
          }
          & > a:hover {
            /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
            color: #022570 !important;
          }
        }

      }

      & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-submenu:hover{
        background-color: #0175c6 !important;
      }

      & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-submenu {
        background-color: #0a3757 !important;
        & > div{
          color: #fff !important;
          & span {
            /*margin-left:12px;*/
          }
          & > i {
            /*padding-right:17px;*/
          }
        }
        & > div:hover {
          /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
          color: #022570 !important;
        }

        &.ant-menu-item-selected {
          /*background-color: #cfecff !important;*/
          & > div{
            color: #fff !important;
          }
          & > div:hover {
            /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
            color: #022570 !important;
          }
        }

        & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-item:hover{
          background-color: #0095ea !important;
        }

        & > .ant-menu-sub > .ant-menu-item {
          background-color: #062c46 !important;
          & > a{
            color: #fff !important;
          }
          & > a:hover {
            /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
            color: #022570 !important;
          }

          &.ant-menu-item-selected {
            background-color: #cfecff !important;
            & > a{
              color: #2f54eb !important;
            }
            & > a:hover {
              /*color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);*/
              color: #022570 !important;
            }
          }

        }


      }
    }
  }
</style>

<style>
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub{
    background-color: #0a3757 !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item:hover{
    background-color: #0175c6 !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item > a{
    color:#fff;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item > a:hover{
    color:#022570;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub  .ant-menu-item-selected{
    background-color: #cfecff  !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item-selected > a{
    color: #2f54eb;
  }


  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-sub{
    background-color: #0a3757 !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu:hover{
    background-color: #0175c6 !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu > div{
    color: #fff;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu > div:hover{
    color: #022570;
  }


  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu .ant-menu-sub{
    background-color: #062c46 !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item:hover{
    background-color: #0095ea !important;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item-selected{
    background-color: #cfecff;
  }
  .ant-menu-dark .ant-menu-submenu .ant-menu-sub .ant-menu-item-selected > a{
    color: #2f54eb;
  }
</style>

<!-- update_end author:sunjianlei date:20190530 for: 选中首页的时候不显示背景颜色 -->
